e="preserve">Vladimir Maksimovich Salkov (,; 1 April 1937 – 9 July 2020) was a Russian-Ukrainian football manager and defender. He was born in Stalino, Ukrainian SSR. He was known for playing and coaching with Shakhtar Donetsk. He also held brief assistant managing sessions with the Soviet Union national football team.
Salkov died on 9 July 2020, aged 83.
